elements.name: A pet order should be completed successfully by a user

steps.name: i post an order for a pet by orderId 1
pet order is completed and status set as "placed" successfully
i try to get order details by orderId 1
order details should be able to displayed for orderId 1 successfully

elements.name: Details should not be displayed for nonexistent order id

steps.name: i try to get order details by orderId 400
error message should be received "Order not found"
i try to delete order details by orderId 4
